channel.title: web-dev on Kyle Malloy, PE
channel.description: Recent content in web-dev on Kyle Malloy, PE

item.title: Free Privacy-Focused Analytics with Vercel
item.description: A free Google Analytics alternative with better UI/UX and complete privacy for your users. Why use Vercel Analytics? # #1 Privacy # Data privacy has become a mainstream concern. Rather than giving up your user’s data to big tech when using a tool like Google Analytics, you can build trust with your users, and only store anonymized data.

item.title: Configure Vercel Speed Insights API with Sveltekit & Typescript
item.description: Intro # Vercel Speed Insights is a great tool that can track performance of your website or application overtime, providing checkpoints for production builds, so you can more easily troubleshoot performance drops between releases.

item.title: Fireship FKIT Course Notes
item.description: I recently completed the Sveltekit Full Course from Fireship.io where you build a Linktree clone using Sveltekit, Firebase, Tailwind, and Daisy UI. As someone new to web development in general, I ran into some problems along the way.
